landing.title: Visualize your dreams, manifest your reality
landing.subtitle: Create a personalized video of your ideal future. See yourself living your dreams and activate the law of attraction.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: In a few simple steps, activate your manifestation power
landing.step1Desc: Use your camera to capture different angles of your face or upload your photos.
landing.step2Desc: Tell in detail what you wish to manifest: your ideal life, your goals, your aspirations.
landing.step3Desc: Watch your video every day. Feel the emotions of your realized future.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Create your personalized visualization video and activate the law of attraction.
landing.testimonial1Text: I watched my visualization every morning before work. Within a month, I landed a promotion I'd been hoping for. The clarity it gave me was transformative.
landing.testimonial2Text: I was skeptical at first, but seeing myself achieve my goals on screen shifted something inside me. Six weeks later, I signed the lease on my dream flat.
landing.testimonial3Text: The video made my goals feel tangible. I started acting as if they were already happening, and opportunities began appearing everywhere.
